name: Hunt for Gold
description:
Your goal in this game is to find as much gold, as you can and buy every upgrade in the shop.

You are equipped with gold detector, that helps you find gold more easily. There are 5 variants of gold, which are hidden in random generated map. Use your energy carefully, but also don't forget about the timer.

This game was made for Mini Jam 85: Gold, it was my first Game Jam. The theme was gold and limitation one-minute timer. Game still has some bugs, but I hope you will atleast like the core mechanic of the game.

Everything in game (except Mini Jam 85 logo) is created by me in limit of 72 hours.

The game has ending. Hint: Shop

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
